page.title: 03EASTLEIGH HEALTH SERVICES
page.content: Eastleigh enjoys good health services. It has numerous General Practitioners who have District Nurses,Midwives and Health Visitors to call on for their specialist knowledge.Eastleigh has a large Health Centre in Newtown Road where more service,e.g.dental,speech therapy,Child Health Clinics,Child Guidance,Family Planning,Youth Advisory,Audiology ,chiropody, pre-conception, ante and post_natal services are available with their own specialist including a Paediatric Consultant,Child Psychiatrist,School Doctors and Nurses.Also available is an Adult Psychologist,Community Psychiatric Nurse and Physiotherapists Each school has a visiting School Doctor, Nurse and Health Visitor to detect health problems, refer to a Specialists and to promote good health in the young.
